title: Six Deals You Need To Know About In Australia Today
text:
Image: Gizmodo

G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: Get Voice Calculator Pro (RRP: $9.99) on Android for free, 25% off alcohol at Booze Bud, OzGameShop's big video game clearance, 45% off Lenovo ThinkPads and more!

1. Video game clearance: OzGameShop just added a bunch new titles to its Clearance Store with big savings on PC, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One games & accessories. Prices start at under $7. Click here!

2. 45% off Lenovo ThinkPads You can currently nab up to 45% off select Lenovo ThinkPad laptops with prices starting at just $989. The sale ends 31 October. Click here!

3. Get free rent for a year: Leatherman is running a competition to win a year's worth of free rent (or $25,000's worth - whichever happens first.) To be in the running, all you have to do is explain in 25 words or less why you deserve to win. That's it! Click here to enter.

4. 25% off at Booze Bud: Booze Bud is having a 25% off sale when you spend $75. The sale includes beer, wines and spirits. To get the deal, use the discount code '25BOOZE' at checkout. As an added bonus, you also get free shipping. Click here!

5. Free voice calculator for Android: The Google Play Store is currently giving away ATNSOFT's Multi-Screen Voice Calculator Pro for free. This app usually costs $9.99. Click here!

6. 64% off men's sneakers: Catch is having another clearance sale on men's footwear. You can save up to 64% off select styles from Asics, Nike, Adidas, Converse, Reebok and more Click here!

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: Get Voice Calculator Pro (RRP: $9.99) on Android for free, 25% off alcohol at Booze Bud, OzGameShop's big video game clearance, 45% off Lenovo ThinkPads and more!...
